comment_text: It's weird how Oracle is #1 on https://db-engines.com/en/ranking but #6 on https://db-engines.com/en/ranking.  I wonder why the discrepancy.

I have to say, I like how this page has been changing lately:
[https://db-engines.com/en/system/Oracle%3BPostgreSQL](https://db-engines.com/en/system/Oracle%3BPostgreSQL)

Postgres has risen more than 60 points in the last year, while Oracle has fallen by more than 90.  Don't get me wrong, Oracle has a long way to fall, and it won't fall extremely far, but it's nice to see PG giving it a run for its money.
Damn right. Hopefully Postgres 10 will take a good chunk of users off of Oracle.
